if(Use_MultiProc)
    find_package(Boost 1.70 REQUIRED)
    if(Boost_FOUND)
        message(STATUS "Found Boost ${Boost_VERSION}")
        #set(Boost_USE_STATIC_LIBS ON)
        set(BOOST_TOOLKITS ${Boost_LIBRARIES})
    endif(Boost_FOUND)

    if(DEFINED Boost_INCLUDE_DIRS AND DEFINED Boost_LIBRARIES)
        add_library(BOOST INTERFACE)
        install (TARGETS BOOST DESTINATION ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/bin)
        target_link_libraries(BOOST INTERFACE ${BOOST_TOOLKITS})
        target_include_directories(BOOST INTERFACE ${Boost_INCLUDE_DIRS}/boost/asio)
        message(STATUS "BOOST include_dir ${Boost_INCLUDE_DIRS}/boost/asio")
    endif(DEFINED Boost_INCLUDE_DIRS AND DEFINED Boost_LIBRARIES)
endif(Use_MultiProc)
